ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: CEB was supported by a National Science Foundation Graduate Research Fellowship at Princeton University, a Miller Institute for Basic Research Fellowship at UC Berkeley, a DARPA PREEMPT program Cooperative Agreement grant D18AC00031, and an NIH grant 1R01AI129822-01. Tissue culture experiments were funded by an NIH grant R01 AI134824 to KC. Work in LFW’s lab was funded by the Singapore National Research Foundation grants (NRF2012NRF-CRP001-056 and NRF2016NRF-NSFC002-013). CD was supported by the German Research Council (DFG) grant DFG SPP1596 (DR 772/10–2), the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) grant RAPID (#01KI1723A) and the EU Horizon 2020 grant EVAg (#653316). The authors thank the Chandran lab at Albert Einstein College of Medicine – in particular, Cecilia Harold, Megan Slough, Rohit Jangra, and Tanwee Alkutkar – for technical support during tissue culture experiments. The authors further thank Jessica Metcalf and the Graham lab at Princeton for conceptual guidance throughout the project’s development.
